config.script:
import traceback
	
	logger = system.util.getLogger("CampusStore.Button Select")
	
	try:
		row = self.parent.parent.getChild("Results").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
		pid = self.parent.parent.getChild("Results").getChild("Table").props.data[row].value.participant_id
		
		if pid is not None:
			system.perspective.sendMessage("storeParticipantSelected",
					payload={'participantId': pid},
					scope="page")
		else:
			self.parent.parent.getChild("Label").showMessage(
					"Selected human does not have a participant ID")
	except:
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

transforms.code:
year = value
	# Generate the Rows
	rows = []
	for x in range(120):
		oneRow = [str(year), year]
		rows.append(oneRow)
		year -= 1
	# Generate the DataSet
	headers = ["1", "2"]
	data = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, rows)
	return data

import calendar
	month = 1
	# Generate the Rows
	rows = []
	for x in range(12):
		oneRow = [str(format(month,'02d')), calendar.month_name[x+1]]
		rows.append(oneRow)
		month += 1
	# Generate the DataSet
	headers = ["1", "2"]
	data = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, rows)
	return data

import calendar
	#Get the year from the dropdown
	if self.view.params.dob_year != None:
		selected_year = self.view.params.dob_year
	else:
		selected_year = int(system.date.getYear(system.date.now()))
	year = int(selected_year)		
	#Get the month from the drop down	
	if self.view.params.dob_month != None:
		if str(self.view.params.dob_month[1])== '0':
			selected_month = int(str(self.view.params.dob_month[1]))
		else:
			selected_month = int(str(self.view.params.dob_month))
	else:
		selected_month = 12
	month = int(selected_month)
	#Get the number of days in the month
	days_in_month = calendar.monthrange(year,month)[1]
	#system.perspective.print(str(year) + ',' + str(month) + ',' + str(days_in_month))
	# Generate the Rows
	rows = []
	for x in range(days_in_month):
		oneRow = [str(format(x+1,'02d')), x+1]
		rows.append(oneRow)
	# Generate the DataSet
	headers = ["1", "2"]
	data = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, rows)
	return data

customMethods.script:
import time
	#system.perspective.print(message)
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

config.script:
selected_row = self.props.selection.selectedRow
	#system.perspective.print(selected_row)
	human_id = self.props.data[selected_row].value.human_id
	participant_id = self.props.data[selected_row].value.participant_id
	first_name = self.props.data[selected_row].value.first_name
	last_name = self.props.data[selected_row].value.last_name
	participant_active = self.props.data[selected_row].value.participant
	#system.perspective.print(participant_id) 
	#Participant doesn't exist
	if participant_id == None:
		#The human exists, add to participants
		id = "pop_participants_copy_human" 
		view = "Participants/Registration/Search/PopupCopyHuman"
		parameters = {'first_name':first_name,'last_name':last_name,'human_id':human_id}
		system.perspective.openPopup(id,view,parameters,showCloseIcon = False, modal = True)

transforms.code:
#system.perspective.print('Search Value Change Detected')
	#Assign variables from parameters
	first_name = self.view.params.first_name
	middle_name = self.view.params.middle_name
	last_name = self.view.params.last_name
	nick_name = self.view.params.nick_name
	race_id = self.view.params.race_id
	ssn = self.view.params.ssn
	dob_year = self.view.params.dob_year
	dob_month = self.view.params.dob_month
	dob_day = self.view.params.dob_day
	#system.perspective.print('year:' + str(dob_year) + ', month:' + str(dob_month) + ', day:' + str(dob_day))
	#
	#Only run the query if there is search criteria
	if (
		first_name != None or middle_name != None or last_name != None or nick_name != None
		or race_id != None or ssn != None
		or dob_year != None or dob_month != None or dob_day != None
		):
		#system.perspective.print('Data Requested')
		project = 'RITI'
		path = "Participants/Registration/FindMatches"
		parameters = {"first_name":first_name,
					"middle_name":middle_name,
					"last_name":last_name,
					"nick_name":nick_name,
					"race_id":race_id,
					"dob_year":dob_year,
					"dob_month":dob_month,
					"dob_day":dob_day,
					"ssn":ssn}
		search_results = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
		#return search_results
		#table_data is the data object to return
		table_data = []
	
		#Iterate over the results of the query
		for row in range(search_results.getRowCount()):
			row_struct = {}
			row_data = {}
			style = {}	
			#Map query results into correct attributes
			row_data['human_id'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "human_id")
			row_data['participant_id'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "participant_id")
			if search_results.getValueAt(row, "participant_id") != None:
				if search_results.getValueAt(row, "participant_retired") != None:
					row_data['participant'] = 2
				else:
					row_data['participant'] = 1
			else:
				row_data['participant'] = 0
				
			if search_results.getValueAt(row, "volunteer_id") != None:
				if search_results.getValueAt(row, "volunteer_retired") != None:
					row_data['volunteer'] = 2
				else:
					row_data['volunteer'] = 1
			else:
				row_data['volunteer'] = 0
					
			if search_results.getValueAt(row, "employee_id") != None:
				if search_results.getValueAt(row, "employee_retired") != None:
					row_data['employee'] = 2
				else:
					row_data['employee'] = 1
			else:
				row_data['employee'] = 0

			row_data['first_name'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "first_name")
			row_data['middle_name'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "middle_name")
			row_data['last_name'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "last_name")
			row_data['nick_name'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "nick_name")
			row_data['ssn'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "ssn")
			row_data['dob'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "dob")
			row_data['race_id'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "race_id")
			row_data['race'] = search_results.getValueAt(row, "race")
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
			row_struct['value'] = row_data
			row_struct['style'] = style
			#Append the individual row date to the table data object
			table_data.append(row_struct)
				
		return table_data
	else:
		return []
